articles.author: Mandar Oak, Nathan Howard Gray, Peter Draper
articles.title: What the ‘mother of all deals’ between India and the EU means for global trade - The Conversation
articles.description: The new agreement will affect the lives of 2 billion people across economies representing about a quarter of global GDP.
articles.content: The mother of all deals: thats how European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen described the new free trade agreement between the European Union and India, announced on Tuesday after about two… [+6801 chars]
